name: teentoday.co.uk
tag_list: publisher, online-publisher, teen, kids, youth, publication
overview:
teentoday.co.uk is an online publisher of youth-targeted editorial in the UK.

Founded in 1997, teentoday.co.uk is a premium editorial environment that has been publishing new music, street style, film, advice, book and beauty content for 12 years. The content is delivered as articles, audio, video, tweets and status updates.

The core values for editorial on the site are substance, honesty and a two way dialogue with users.

teentoday.co.uk receives 100k monthly unique users and is perceived as a major online teen destination in the UK. It has 20,000 registered members.

teentoday.co.uk has a social strategy that sees it visible on all major social networks/spaces as well as hosting video content in the youtube environment.

teentoday.co.uk is owned and editor by Oliver Meakings. There are 3 part-time unpaid writers in the editorial team.
